remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器使用属性来检索表示与关联的控件的设计时对象设计图面上的对象。The property is used by the designer to retrieve the design-time object representing the control that is associated with the object on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 对象占用的非托管资源，还可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅 [实现释放 Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息和，请参阅 [清洗向上非托管 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Expressions As ExpressionBindingCollection

summary.span: 获取当前控件在设计时的表达式绑定。

span.span: Gets the expression bindings for the current control at design time.

value.span: 一个 集合，包含为当前控件中的属性设置的表达式字符串。

span.span: An that contains the expressions strings set for properties in the current control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计主机，如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，使用类，以获取类，以获取在设计时设置的控件属性的表达式。The design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the class to get the class to get the to set expressions for control properties at design time. 表达式字符串引用可本地化的资源、 应用程序设置、 连接字符串或自定义表达式类型。Expression strings reference a localizable resource, an application setting, a connection string, or a custom expression type. 集合包含每个具有一个关联的表达式字符串的控件属性的元素。The collection contains an element for each control property that has an associated expression string. 每个每个元素的属性指示的关联的表达式生成器实现。Each property for each element indicates the associated expression builder implementation. 表达式字符串进行分析和计算由其关联以在运行时确定的控件属性值。The expression string is parsed and evaluated by its associated to determine the control property value at run time.

span.span: The control element for design.

summary.span: 初始化设计器并设置用于设计的组件。

span.span: Initializes the designer and sets the component for design.

span.para: 在初始化期间，使用和方法要将属性映射到样式属性。
During initialization, use the and methods on the property to map properties to styles.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnBehaviorAttached() cil managed
abstract member OnBehaviorAttached : unit -> unit override this.OnBehaviorAttached : unit -> unit

summary.span: 当某个行为与该元素关联时被调用。

span.span: Called when a behavior is associated with the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 方法已过时。The method is obsolete. 使用和方法要将属性映射到样式属性。Use the and methods on the property to map properties to styles. 使用方法类来在设计时设置控件的样式。Use the method on the class to set styles for the control at design time. 重写方法，以在设计时操作控件的初始样式。Override the method to manipulate the initial styles for the control at design time.

span.para: 方法可以重写并实现一种行为附加到设计器时执行其他处理。
The method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when a behavior is attached to the designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnBehaviorDetaching() cil managed
abstract member OnBehaviorDetaching : unit -> unit override this.OnBehaviorDetaching : unit -> unit

summary.span: 当某个行为与该元素取消关联时被调用。

span.span: Called when a behavior disassociates from the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 方法已过时。The method is obsolete. 使用和方法要将属性映射到样式属性。Use the and methods on the property to map properties to styles. 使用方法类来在设计时设置控件的样式。Use the method on the class to set styles for the control at design time. 重写控件设计器之前释放的设计器的对象执行操作的方法。Override the method for the control designer to perform actions before the designer object is released.

span.para: M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBehaviorDetaching 方法可以重写并实现一种行为分离从设计器时执行其他处理。
The M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBehaviorDetaching method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when a behavior is detached from the designer.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is to handle the Changed event on the DataBindings collection. The DataBindings collection allows more control of the databindings associated with the control. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

span.span: The name of the property that has changed.

summary.span: 提供可用于指示数据绑定更改时间的方法。

span.span: Provides a method that can be used to indicate when a data binding has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器具有到控件的数据绑定进行更改之后，应由控件设计器调用方法。The method should be called by a control designer after the control designer has made a change to the data bindings for the control. > [!NOTE] > 方法已过时。The method is obsolete. 使用上的事件等效的控件设计器功能的集合。Use the event on the collection for equivalent control designer functionality.

span.para: 方法可以重写并实现控件的数据绑定集合已更改时执行其他处理。
The method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when the data bindings collection for the control has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSetParent() cil managed
abstract member OnSetParent : unit -> unit override this.OnSetParent : unit -> unit

summary.span: 提供一种在将关联控件附加到父控件时执行附加处理的方式。

span.span: Provides a way to perform additional processing when the associated control is attached to a parent control.

span.para: 方法可以重写并实现设计器附加到父控件时执行其他处理。
The method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when the designer is attached to a parent control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterEvents(class System.Collections.IDictionary events) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterEvents (events As IDictionary)

param.name: events
param.span: 包含要公开的组件的事件名称的 。

span.span: An that contains the names of the events of the component to expose.

summary.span: 设置在设计时为用于组件的 对象公开的事件列表。

span.span: Sets the list of events that are exposed at design-time for the object for the component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了如何将项添加到或从通过设计器来公开的事件的字典中移除项对象。The method provides a way to add items to or remove items from the dictionary of events that a designer exposes through a object. 中的事件字典的键是事件的名称。The keys in the dictionary of events are the names of the events. 对象属于类型。The objects are of type .

span.para: 你可以直接修改字典可通过访问或将其保留原样。如果您要重写方法，在执行您自己的筛选之前调用基实现。

You can directly modify the dictionary that is accessible through or you can leave the dictionary unchanged. If you are overriding the method, call the base implementation before you perform your own filtering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了如何将项添加到或从通过设计器来公开的属性的字典中移除项对象。The method provides a way to add items to or remove items from the dictionary of properties that a designer exposes through a object. 属性的字典中的键是属性的名称。The keys in the dictionary of properties are the names of the properties. 对象属于类型。The objects are of type .

span.para: 你可以直接修改字典可通过访问或将其保留原样。如果您要重写方法，在执行您自己的筛选之前调用基实现。

You can directly modify the dictionary that is accessible through or you can leave the dictionary unchanged. If you are overriding the method, call the base implementation before you perform your own filtering.
